summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Matte Revolution Lipstick is a matte lipstick that features a long-lasting, buildable, and hydrating formula.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe lipstick features 3D glow pigments that help lips appear wider and fuller.The matte formula is enriched with Charlotte's secret ingredient and orchid extract to protect and soothe lips for a cashmere finish.The unique, square-angled tip mimics the shape of a lip brush for a precise application.Matte Finish.Long-Wearing.Without Parabens.FeaturesThe lipstick features 3D glow pigments that help lips appear wider and fuller.The matte formula is enriched with Charlotte's secret ingredient and orchid extract to protect and soothe lips for a cashmere finish.The unique, square-angled tip mimics the shape of a lip brush for a precise application.This lipstick comes in a range of shades, including the bestselling Pillow Talk, giving every woman the choice of a perfect nude or pop of color.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.Item 2619356How To UseBegin by applying Lip Cheat liner (sold separately) To dial up your look, and even longer staying power, fill your lips with the lip liner.Apply Matte Revolution straight from the bullet for fuller, wider lips. The unique square tip applicator provides precision when applying.IngredientsNeopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Dimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Polyethylene, Polybutene, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Mica, Ethyl Vanillin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Orchis Mascula Flower Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Bht, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Begin by applying Lip Cheat liner (sold separately) To dial up your look, and even longer staying power, fill your lips with the lip liner.Apply Matte Revolution straight from the bullet for fuller, wider lips. The unique square tip applicator provides precision when applying.

reviews.headline: I love this perfect fall red!
reviews.comments: I had a sample of this color and went ahead and bought the full size. It is a great red. Not too warm or cool. The formula is matte, but not drying. The packaging is beautiful and the shade looks rich and stays good. I would use a lipliner just to define

reviews.headline: I Love This Brand
reviews.comments: I bought first dance.  It is a beautiful color. The case is pretty with rhibestones and the color stays on throughout the day.

reviews.headline: TEN STARS!
reviews.comments: I already own several shades which are gorgeous and fade naturally throughout the day. "Supermodel" just arrived in the mail. The shade is so perfect that I can wear it with no other makeup. Unbelievable for a matte lipstick. Nothing beats CT's formula.

reviews.headline: "Cinematic Red" -  definitely should've chosen a better name
reviews.comments: It's more of a burgundy â€“ calling it "Cinematic Red" is misleading to me. The pictures on the lips make it look like it's more red than it actually is. This is too dark for me. Other than the shade being a pure letdown, I suppose it it's probably a nice lipstick. Unfortunately I just won't be wearing it. Wasted money to figure that out.

reviews.headline: Product issues-not buying again
reviews.comments: Love the colors and staying power of this lipstick, however two of them have just broken in the middle when they weren't even being used or carried around in my bag. Because of this, I won't buy these lipsticks again.

reviews.headline: I would buy this item again
reviews.comments: Love her lipstick

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: The lipstick covers smoothly and feels great on my lips.  It stays on longer then most.

reviews.headline: Perfect color for me
reviews.comments:
So glad I found a color that goes great with my face. I've had lipsticks chap up my lips but this one is different, It doesn't chap up my lips! love this lipstick!
(Use it after the lip cheat pillow talk and my lips look nice and full)

reviews.headline: Love this color
reviews.comments: I have used Charlotte Tilbury pillow talk lipstick and felt it was too light.  I was able to try while visiting in a Scottsdale Ulta,  Wedding Belles and found my holy grail for my go to nude color! Perfect how it glides on and long lasting wear.  It fades beautifully and lasts for hours!!  So happy with this purchase!  Pairs well with pillow talk medium lip cheat.

reviews.headline: Only lipstick I will buy
reviews.comments: I am converted to Charlotte Tilbury.   Ibhave never worn a better lip product and I have worn just about every brand at some point with no loyalty till now.  This is the only brand of lip producta worth buying.  Great colors that look amazing on, so long lasting and a great texture and feel.  Im sold for life.

reviews.headline: Dries out lips
reviews.comments: Im new to wearing lipstick (at 40) and this one just left my lips so dry. I dont think its something im going to be able to wear often.

reviews.headline: Beautiful neutral color
reviews.comments: Moisturizing, good color, interesting chocolate like scent, but not much staying power.

reviews.headline: Consistent quality!
reviews.comments: Fab consistency moisturizes without any perfumed smell and taste.

reviews.headline: Really enjoy these!
reviews.comments: These are my favorite lipsticks. Love the shades, packaging is lovely and the matte formula is slightly dry but I just dab a bit of gloss. Reach for them daily along with Charlottes other formulas. Im light olive and love Catwalking, Very Victoria is nice, too.

reviews.headline: Really Pretty Pink Nude
reviews.comments: I've been using this shade for a couple of years now. It's a wonderful lipstick it's very appealing likely most people. It's Pillow Talk, pink nude. It's very natural.

reviews.headline: Red
reviews.comments: Purchased for my niece for her birthday she liked it

reviews.headline: OBSESSED
reviews.comments: This is the holy grail & I dont think ill ever be able to go back to another lipstick again

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love it will bye again

reviews.headline: Awesome Product!
reviews.comments: Beautiful shade and nice packaging.  Long wearing and smooth

reviews.headline: Velvety, smells good, maybe dries my lips up?
reviews.comments: Glides over my lips sooo smoothly like velvet. And the fragrance is such a lovely surprise, think it's definitely worth the prices. It's high quality. It's also buildable! If I only do one soft coat, it's pinkish , but with multiple I can get a deeper red shade which is sweet.

media.headline: Perfect color for me
media.caption: Pillow talk lip cheat and lipstick

faceoff_positive.comments: I was so excited to receive this Charlotte Tilbury Matte Revolution Lipstick in Hollywood Vixen because I'm obsessed with lipstick and liner and wear it daily. Applying lipstick daily is like breathing; so when you get a magnificent one, you delight in it. This red is the PERFECT vibrant red for full, bold lips. I'm not usually a fan of red though because I feel it washes me out; but not this beautiful color. It's more of a cool toned red that brings life back to your face. You can literally just line your lips and apply this and it'll feel like a great makeup day. The application is flawless! It's rich and creamy when you apply it but has the most lovely matte finish. It's just so pretty for any and every occasion. It's ideal for date night or the office. It's such a versatile color. The texture of the lipstick itself is just perfection and leaves lips moisturized. It applies seamlessly and stays on for hours! You don't have to worry about the color transferring or constantly needing to reapply; but the lipstick case itself is marvelous and luxurious so you're going to want to bring it with you everywhere and pull it out anyway. I love everything about this from the hydration it provides, to the perfectly matte pout it gives. I can't recommend this enough and I'm going to buy more shades because it's truly an incredible lipstick.
faceoff_positive.headline: Glamorous creamy red for a flawless matte lip!

faceoff_negative.comments: This lipstick provided long lasting color and it absolutely softened my lips.  The color "Hollywood Vixen" RED isn't the best color for me.  But this was sent to me for me to use and provide my feedback on the actual lipstick brand and not the specific color.  I would not pick red for myself, i prefer warm/mauve colors.  But putting aside the red color of this lipstick, I'd say that it is a lipstick that definitely has a matte finish, wears well, goes on smooth, provides good coverage, softened my lips, and the color lasted all day long. I'm sure if the color option had been more suitable to my skin tone and shades I normally wear then I would have loved it even more.  If you love red matte lipstick then you'd absolutely love this brand.
faceoff_negative.headline: Long lasting color
